name: Pain Train
description: Shoot your way through 12 gore packed levels, complete side missions, unlock new weapons, beat multiple difficulty modes, and defeat all of the cyborg masterminds. Pain Train is entering a subway station near you, "All Aboard!
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7 32-bit or better Processor: 2.4ghz i5 or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 2 GB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
